item.description:
This class uses isolations to build lean strong muscles throughout the body. We use a chair, a body ball, and resistance bands to help balance and use our own body weight to build muscles you may have forgot about. You will leave this class knowing and feeling like you got an unbelievable workout. It improves posture , builds lean muscle, and burns calories all at once. If you always wanted a ballerina body give it try.

$10/class or $90/10 classes (package can also be used for Zumba, Strip Fit, Bootcamp, and Hip Hop)

*Please register for Trim & Tone here www.bridgetsdancestudio.com 

**YOU MUST REGISTER AT LEAST 24 HOURS BEFORE THE CLASS**

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Trim & Tone
